definition: to draw/picture/painting/CL:幅[fu2],張|张[zhang1]/classifier for paintings etc/variant of 劃|划[hua4]

sentences.english: Chinese artists believe that calligraphy and painting share one common source.
sentences.chinese: 國畫家們相信書法和繪畫是相通的。

sentences.english: By study Chinese Painting teaching, we know that, China has an age-old tradition for fine arts education.
sentences.chinese: 研究中國畫教學，就會知道我國有着悠久的美術傳統。

sentences.english: Before accepting regular professional oil painting training, Qin Zanjun was keen on traditional Chinese painting when he was a child.
sentences.chinese: 秦贊軍在接受科班油畫訓練之前，自幼酷愛國畫。

sentences.english: In the afternoon, buy a Chinese painting for Susan.
sentences.chinese: 下午，我爲蘇珊買了一幅國畫。

sentences.english: Chinese painting has an outstanding characteristic, that is to say, poetry or calligraphy is inscribed on paintings.
sentences.chinese: 中國畫有一個顯著的特色，就是把詩或書法題在畫上。

sentences.english: Wu Tongchun's nebular art is expressed by the character of traditional Chinese painting.
sentences.chinese: 吳同椿的星雲世界是用中國畫的特色來表現的。

sentences.english: We go to an exhibition of chinese painting at the museum.
sentences.chinese: 我們去博物館參觀中國畫展。

sentences.english: Visual attribute is the self-creation of Chinese painting with the premise of personal originality.
sentences.chinese: 直觀的自我屬性是中國畫創作具有個人獨創性的前提。

sentences.english: Products for Chinese stone material report.
sentences.chinese: 產品材質爲白玉和國畫石。

sentences.english: Ideological and practical work is the most essential unity of opposites.
sentences.chinese: 虛實關係是中國畫最根本的對立統一關係。

sentences.english: The ornamental lines of the water-wave designs are taken from well-known Chinese paintings of the past.
sentences.chinese: 觀賞線的水波的設計是採取由著名的中國畫的過去。

sentences.english: I bought a piece of Chinese painting.
Chinese painting is known for its brush drawings in black inks and natural colours.
sentences.chinese: 中國畫用毛筆蘸黑墨和天然顏料畫成，並以此著稱。

sentences.english: Chinese painting its brush drawings in black inks and natural colours.
sentences.chinese: 中國畫用毛筆蘸黑墨和天然顏料畫成，並以此而著稱。

sentences.english: Graduation in 1990, the Chinese Painting Department of China Academy of Fine Arts professional portraits.
sentences.chinese: 1990年結業於中國美術學院國畫系人物畫專業。

sentences.english: The time during the Ming and the Qing Dynasties had witnessed the origination and early development of Chinese painting studies.
sentences.chinese: 明清之際是中國畫學研究的醞釀期，學科特徵初顯。

definition: to suggest (rather than depict in detail)/freehand style of Chinese painting, characterized by bold strokes rather than accurate details
Chang Dai-chien or Zhang Daqian (1899-1983), one of the greatest Chinese artists of the 20th century
credentials (of a diplomat)/documents exchanged between nations/national or dynastic history book
